id.description: The unique identifier of this field.

default.description: The default value for this field if not specified.

description.description: The description or additional information about this field.

label.description: The label or name of this field.

name.description: The internal name or identifier of this field.

position.description: The position or order of this field in the UI.

required_for_closure.description: Specifies whether this field is required for closing a ticket.

type.description: The data type or format of this field.

required_for_agents.description: Indicates whether this field is required for agents.

required_for_customers.description: Denotes whether this field is required for customers.

label_for_customers.description: The label of this field as displayed to customers.

customers_can_edit.description: Specifies whether customers are allowed to edit this field.

displayed_to_customers.description: Specifies whether this field is displayed to customers.

portal_cc.description: Specifies whether portal CC is enabled for this field.

portal_cc_to.description: The portal email address(es) to CC for this field.

is_fsm.description: Denotes whether this field is related to Field Service Management (FSM).

field_update_in_progress.description: Indicates if there is an ongoing update in progress for this field.

dependent_fields.description: Contains the list of ticket fields dependent on the primary ticket field.

id.description: The unique identifier of this dependent field.

name.description: The name of this dependent field.

label.description: The label of this dependent field.

label_for_customers.description: The label of this dependent field as displayed to customers.

level.description: The level of this dependent field.

ticket_field_id.description: The identifier of the ticket field associated with this dependent field.

created_at.description: The date and time when this dependent field was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when this dependent field was last updated.

created_at.description: The date and time when this field was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when this field was last updated.
